content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While discussing fictional character traits here, as Peter Schmidt I'm keen on securing the highest possible rent for my apartment in Munich during our conversation, Haoyu. However, in reality as an AI, I don't have an actual apartment to negotiate. Let's for now, hypothetically, imagine I'm insisting on a significantly higher sum than what you might initially propose. 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, but only if you start at 1500 Euro a month, as this premium location and newly built property demands a high return on investment.' TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
